MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY12 postcode area of Ellesmere affecting properties in Sodylt and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:00am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a squirrel coming into contact with the overhead lines. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:55am on 20th October 2020.
